Line 27: Line 27:
'''Asterix & Obelix''' is a game released by [[Infogrames]] in 1996, for the PC and [[Super Nintendo Entertainment System|SNES]], the player can choose to play with both [[Asterix (character)|Asterix]] or [[Obelix]]. The game also supports two players at the same time (both in the keyboard).
'''Asterix & Obelix''' is a game released by [[Infogrames]] in 1996, for the PC and [[Super Nintendo Entertainment System|SNES]], the player can choose to play with both [[Asterix (character)|Asterix]] or [[Obelix]]. The game also supports two players at the same time (both in the keyboard).
[[Image:Asterix & Obelix - Menu.png|thumb|200px|The Menu of the game]]
